stores.name: LEGO® Store Edmonton - West Edmonton Mall
stores.additionalInfo: Looking for a Toy Store in Edmonton? The LEGO® Store West Edmonton is the perfect destination. Head here for a range of exclusive features, activities and demos, including the chance to build your very own custom LEGO minifigure with our Minifigure Factory! And, of course, the very best LEGO sets for children and adults of any age or experience.

stores.name: LEGO® Store Ottawa
stores.additionalInfo:
Looking for a Toy Store in Ottawa? The LEGO® Store Cf Rideau Centre is the perfect destination. With awesome in-store features like a Pick & Build Wall and the opportunity to build your own LEGO minifigure, plus a huge range of LEGO sets for all ages, this store has everything you need – and more.

This LEGO® Store is open with the above adjusted hours. Please be advised that the safety of our visitors and team members remains our first priority. We look forward to welcoming you soon and appreciate your participation with our safety guidelines.

stores.name: LEGO® Store Winnipeg
stores.additionalInfo:
Looking for a Toy Store in Winnipeg? The LEGO® Store Polo Park is the perfect destination. As well as the best selection of LEGO toys for kids and adults, you’ll find a range of in-store play activities and demos to take part in, plus special offers and VIP rewards.

This LEGO® Store is open with the above adjusted hours. Please be advised that the safety of our visitors and team members remains our first priority. We look forward to welcoming you soon and appreciate your participation with our safety guidelines.
